segments.text: Are you sure you know where this bus goes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean it should ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not completely sure if it really does .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dude , are we on the right bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm almost positive that this is the right one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't look like we're on our way to Altadena .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have been riding this bus for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it says Temple City .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yup , I'm never trusting you with the bus schedules again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . But at least we know which bus to catch to get back where we started .
segments.speaker: S2
